title: Oil price spikes to $139 on talks about Russia oil ban, Iran deal delay - Reuters.com
content:
1. Oil price spikes to $139 on talks about Russia oil ban, Iran deal delay  Reuters.com
  2. US crude briefly tops $130 per barrel as oil prices surge to highest since 2008 | English News  WION
  3. As Oil Tops $130, Some OPEC+ Members Say Rally Is Driven by Panic  The Wall Street Journal
  4. COMMODITIES Oil, wheat, nickel storm higher on fears of supply chaos  Reuters.com
  5. Oil prices surge as West mulls sanctions on Russian energy sector â€¢ FRANCE 24 English  FRANCE 24 English
description: Oil prices spiked to their highest levels since 2008 on Monday amid market supply fears as the United States and European allies considered banning Russian oil imports and prospects for a swift return of Iranian crude to global markets receded.
